import React, { Component } from 'react'; import Delete from '../../../images/icons/trash.svg' import Edit from '../../../images/icons/edit.svg' class AddStudentModal extends Component { constructor() { super() this.handleSubmit = this.handleSubmit.bind(); this.state = { user: { firstName: "", lastName: "", email: "", password: "", address: "", unit: "", city: "", state: "", zipcode: "", type: "" }, message: "" } } setEmail(value) { this.setState({ email: value }) } setPassword(value) { this.setState({ password: value }) } setFirstName(value) { this.setState({ firstName: value }) } setLastName(value) { this.setState({ lastName: value }) } setAddress(value) { this.setState({ address: value }) } setUnit(value) { this.setState({ unit: value }) } setCity(value) { this.setState({ city: value }) } setUserState(value) { this.setState({ state: value }) } setZipcode(value) { this.setState({ zipcode: value }) } setType(value) { this.setState({ type: value }) } handleSubmit() { if (this.state.user.type == "Choose...") { this.setState({ message: "Must select a type" }) } } render() { const iconStyle = { width: 18, height: 18 } return (

this.setLastName(e.target.value)} type="text" name="lastName" className="form-control w-100" id="lastName" placeholder="Last Name" />
this.setAddress(e.target.value)} type="text" className="form-control" id="inputAddress" name="address" placeholder="1234 Main St" />
this.setUnit(e.target.value)} type="text" className="form-control" id="inputAddress2" name="unit" placeholder="Apartment, studio, or floor" />
this.setCity(e.target.value)} type="text" className="form-control" name="city" id="inputCity" />
this.setZipcode(e.target.value)} type="text" name="zipcode" className="form-control" id="inputZip" />

); } } export default AddStudentModal;
